name: Daniela Taylor
text: I wish I had gotten the young man's name that took our and made our pizza. We LOVE Godfathers Taco Pizza and they did NOT disappoint today!  We have NO good choices in our town and always have to drive 25-30 mins for anything.  Thank you for the fabulous pizza, you knocked it out!

name: Brian Johnson
text: Pizza was good.  Still not the same as I remembered Godfathers.

name: Nate Steward
text: Nice service

name: Tasty Eric
text: Stopped in to order a pizza and was told the cook was new and couldn't make everything on the menu.  Lots of better pizza options than this place.
